segments.text: Observing this scene, I see the woman at the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's holding a plate and towel, drying it meticulously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I realize the sink is overflowing dramatically.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water sheets down the front, pooling on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron and dress might get soaked soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the left, a boy stands on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching high into the open cabinet for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The jar is full, and he's helping himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the stool tilts backâ€” that's alarming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A girl nearby has her arm up, wanting one too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their expectant faces are cute, amid the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The outside garden through the window is serene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a mix of calm and impending trouble inside.
segments.speaker: PAR
